column5: camped on saturday night at a new lake....I couldn't catch a pike to save my life. Nor did I see or hear anything pike-like  of the lake. There was only one camp on the lake and some guy was trapping minnows. The bait fish volumes were amazing, so either there are no pike or they are well fed.   Yesterday we went to my favorite smallie lake to keep me and the fiance un-bored (is that a word). We snorkeled a bit, found some free lures, then journeyed around the lake. The action was essentially non-stop with over 30 fish boated and over one million strikes. A nice relief for this work-filled summer.                       "He's splashing me!!" hahaha
Nice trip! looks like she's got the fish holding down! though I can't approve of the canucks sweater...
Looks like a fun weekend Chad. Thanks for the report.
Nice work Chad. Looks like you two had a great time.
Always entertaining to catch bass after bass. Good report
Great report and pics Chad It's always fun when you have non stop action catching smallies!!!  dark colors on those beauties Great job you two! Thanks for sharing Jacques
You really can't complain when you catch 30 Smallies Tight Lines SBK
that looks like ablast -  away from everywhere and a bucketful of fish
Liking the summer hair cut bud. Glad you had some fun fishing.
Its much cooler except when the sun beats down. Time for a hat or maybe I'll  wash my hair with sunscreen for the remainder of the summer.
My kinda trip, looks like a blast!
Great stuff as usual....love that shot of the jumping smallie!
1 million strikes?!?! You can't beat that!  LOL!
